text: بشر المنفقين بان لهم عذابا اليما

translations.translation: Give news to the hypocrites that they will have a painful punishment.
Give tidings to the hypocrites that painful is their doom.
Give tidings of painful chastisement to the hypocrites.
Tell the hypocrites that for them there will be a painful torment.
Give glad tidings to the hypocrites, that for them is a painful punishment.
Give to the hypocrites the tidings that there is for them a painful torment.
Announce to the hypocrites that they shall have a painful chastisement:
Give thou good tidings to the hypocrites that for them awaits a painful chastisement.
Bear unto the hypocrites the tidings that for them there is a painful doom;
Warn the hypocrites that for them there is a painful punishment.
Announce thou to the hypocrites that theirs shall be a torment afflictive.
Inform the hypocrites that there is a painful punishment for them
To the Hypocrites give the glad tidings that there is for them (but) a grievous penalty;-
Give to the hypocrites the tidings that there is for them a painful torment.
Give glad tidings to the hypocrites that for them there is a painful punishment.
Inform the hypocrites that they will have a painful punishment.
Give tidings to the hypocrites that there is for them a painful punishment -
[4:138] Give tidings to, inform, O Muhammad (s), the hypocrites that for them there is a painful chastisement, namely, the chastisement of the Fire.

Allah then said about the hypocrites: (Bear unto the hypocrites) 'Abdullah Ibn Ubayy and his followers as well as all hypocrites till the Day of Judgement (the tidings that for them there is a painful doom) which will extend to their hearts;

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { بَشِّرِ } يا أكمل الرسل { ٱلْمُنَافِقِينَ } منهم، وهم الذين يدَّعون الإيمان بك وبكتابك وبدينك على طرف اللسان، وقلبم على الشقاق والطغيان الأصلي { بِأَنَّ لَهُمْ } عند ربهم { عَذَاباً أَلِيماً } [النساء: 138]

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: ثم ذكر وعيدهم فقال: { بشر المنافقين بأن لهم عذابًا أليمًا }
